website_summaries.verdict: The type of portable bonnet hair dryer to choose when you are concerned about space in the bathroom.
pros: Sits on any stable surface so you can perfectly position the dryer cap
Folds up when not in use for better portability
Good for quick storage when not in use
cons: Doesn't heat up as quickly as a dedicated bonnet dryer

customer_reviews.title: I had it on 20 minutes two different places each ...
customer_reviews.text: I had it on 20 minutes two different places each time I anplugged it my outlet was burned
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it made too much noise gave me a headache returned it
customer_reviews.author: C.A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer
customer_reviews.text: This was an.ok dryer. Very old school, but did its job. It actually took less time to dry my hair than when it's done at a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Figured out how to color my own hair from this whole pandemic, well worth the investment and will save money in the long run. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, everything is good, I am happy, thank you seller.
customer_reviews.author: Daron R. Lees

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heat
customer_reviews.text: It arrived earlier than expected, packed very well; the appearance was a bite of a surprise, but, it opened as it should...getting the bottom part of the hood to go into place to extend the depth of the bonnet takes some manipulation to finally get it into place, however even on low, it delivers great heat and that makes up for any at first disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jan P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but loud.
customer_reviews.text: I like this dryer. It's has been great when I need to dry my hair really fast for twist outs or for deep conditioning treatments... Ok so when I first started reading the reviews about this dryer and saw that people where complain about it being loud I thought they were stupid when was the last time you had heard a quiet Dryer lol but when I turn it to the guest setting it has a bit of a whistle that is accompanied by the normal blowing sound u would expect from a blowdry.
customer_reviews.author: Izumi951

customer_reviews.title: Salon results
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer because it can actually dry a short woman's hair. I am 5 feet and had a different hair dryer that didn't go low enough for shorter individuals; my hair would barely dry so i decided to get this dryer. This dryer actually goes lower than i thought and it dries my hair pretty quick. I have curly Hispanic hair and it takes about 35-40 minutes to dry.
customer_reviews.author: lan

customer_reviews.title: Bought used and love it
customer_reviews.text: I have very curly hair and I like to do frequent deep conditioners and hot oils. The power of this item, for it's price and size, is amazing. It is easy to move around. I can put this on the table while I work on my laptop, i can put it on a stool while I play my video games, and i am glad that i got it. I did a foam roller wrap and that worked as well. Im happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: newgarbagetruck

customer_reviews.title: It is powerful and hot enough on the low setting ...
customer_reviews.text: It is powerful and hot enough on the low setting. However, it is not very deep even with the full hood turned down and only dries the top of my head, but not the sides and ends. I have short hair length which goes to the base of my neck. I often wind up having to use my hand blow dryer to dry the ends.
customer_reviews.author: rewjd

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Dryer BUT>>
customer_reviews.text: This Dryer does get just as hot as one might hope.. maybe a little to hot on the hottest setting for some. I have had my dryer for a whole now. On one side the knob has broken off I had to glue it back. Sometimes it has a gap in the back because of how dryer folds down to close, but it's an easy fix. The one thing I do like about this dryer is how it takes up minimal space after closing
customer_reviews.author: FABS

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing my own hair since my beautician retired unexpectedly. I had to create my own "salon" at home. This hair dryer is great for deep conditioning and coloring. Although I am afraid to use the high setting as I don't want to burn out the motor, the low setting works fine for me. The compact size is also a plus if you have limited space.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allsup

customer_reviews.title: Same Price / Brand New
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know they still sold these, so I started on ebay. Prices started at around $30 and would take 7-10 days to get to us. I checked Amazon and for $5 less, I could get it with prime in 2 days. Won on both counts! Not crazy about how the cord winds up - gets in the way, but dryer works great - runs 30 minutes a night to dry kids hair before bed.
customer_reviews.author: 5munchkins

customer_reviews.title: Cyndi M. TX
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best little hair dryer I have ever seen for the non-professional hair stylist. It is perfect for those in-between/emergency hair fixes that need to be done when you can't make your hair salon appointment. It has only two settings but they are more than adequate for drying the hair. I have short hair so I don't use any rollers, only mousse. My drying time takes less than 30 minutes. This dryer is compact and easy to store -- it folds to about 2-3 inches in height and the cord folds right into the side of the base. For the price, I found it to be one of my best online purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: could be deeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dryer to have IF you have short hair AND you do not want to set your hair with rollers. The bonnet just isn't deep enough. It's almost too shallow for my short hair cut. I have to move my head around to get heat on all parts of my hair. That said it suits its at home purpose ok. If Conair would design one with a deeper hood bonnet (even if it cost more)this product would be excellent! As is-it's just ok.
customer_reviews.author: KBZ

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer .its super powerful It’s easy to take on the go . I live the white color and the price was phenomenal . Thank you amazon for sending me such a great product . My hair rollers dry so fast without going to the hair salon . 5 stars . Shipping was super fast
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Hoochie

customer_reviews.title: Helps me study by blocking out noise :)
customer_reviews.text: I am african american and I use this dryer once a week for my wraps and roller sets. It doesn't have the holes on the sides but it's not a big deal. It is a little loud but I check email and study while I'm under the dryer, so it blocks out any household noise enabling me to concentrate without interruptions. I've never owned one before but it seems like it gets hot enough like the salon dryers. Ive had it for probably about a year and it's holding up well. I love that it easily folds up and stores in my bathroom closet on the shelf. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Rutland

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using mine for a couple of months now, it's a great deal for the price. Other reviewers have complained about Instability, this has not been a problem for me at all. Yes, it's made mostly of cheap plastic, but what do you expect for this price? It is obviously not for use in a salon but it's a great at home version. Dries my curly hair completely on low in about 10 minutes and all I have to do is sit and read a magazine or play some Angry Birds.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimerika

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine. Gets hot quickly. The high setting is a bit *too* high and low setting is more like medium. There should be more settings, as well as a cool setting. I got it on sale (it was about $28), so it was worth the value. If I had to pay full price, I would have rated this a lot lower. It gets the job done, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Clips break off fast
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a few months and and the clips have already fell off. Now I cant keep it closed. I really liked that fact that it stayed hot and smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I've transitioned to natural hair, and the need for deep conditioning with heat has increased exponentially. I love this dryer. It's convenient, easy to assemble (no real assembly required), light-weight, and easy to set up. I sit under it every weekend and it's still getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Frasier

customer_reviews.title: PLENTY OF HEAT
customer_reviews.text: iI LOVE MY HAIR DRYER! It heats up fast and drys your hair quickly. I had an expensive one that I loaned out and never got it back. So I decided to purchase this, "I'm glad I did!" The hair dryer is very easy to assemble and disassemble. I'm so happy that I made this purchase. I recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun J.

customer_reviews.title: Everything else on this product is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Works Well, However the Bonnet will not fully deploy without first raising the top adjuster fully. I think if someone had arthritis it would be near impossible to do. I will spray a little silicon on the slide and get it to move easier.Everything else on this product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H Keener

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dryer at a great price on amazon. I have had it for almost a year now (writing the review late). I initially got it because I had a short hair cut and needed to set my hair. My hair is long now and I still use the dryer. I have no complaints whatsoever. I think buying this dryer was a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Hip-Hop Scholar, Educator, Writer, Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The air dryer is great so far.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my hair dryer. I am sitting under it right now. It is quieter than all the other bonnet hair dryers I previously had. The negative reviews almost deterred me from buying it but I am very glad I did. I feel the air drying my whole head. I do not have to lean to one side or the other. The low setting for heat is just right. I just can imagine what the high would feel like. I give this dryer 5 stars for the price as well as how well it works. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this product for quite some time, and when her last one finally wore out I ordered another one as a replacement. She has long, thick hair and finds this kind of dryer works best for her hair. She sets the dryer on her bathroom countertop, sits under it on her dressing chair, and reads her Kindle while her hair dries. Next best thing to going to the hair dresser.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: hair dryer really blows big time (pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: i've never ordered this type of dryer before..and I thought the collapsible was a great idea. But 1st time using it was horrible. I noticed a distinct odor blowing at first it smelled like it was burning....but then something else no idea what it was it wasn't 2 minutes when I had problems breathing, chest pain when attempted to breathe and burning eyes. Once I turned it off and the air cleared the problem stopped. I don't know what that problem was all about but it should be on recall. I ended up having to return it. I couldn't understand conair is a good brand. I wouldn't recommend this particular dryer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up properly.
customer_reviews.text: This dryer would work well if you have a perfect table behind your chair and don't have a lot of hair at the back of your neck. There is no forgiveness in the hood height and no air circulating near your nape. I've had this dryer and am giving up and getting a bonnet style.
customer_reviews.author: BookwormNJ

customer_reviews.title: ... complaints - I've only used it once but I LOVE how compact it is
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints - I've only used it once but I LOVE how compact it is; and my hair turned out GREAT. I've got shoulder length natural hair and I was able to use rollers in my hair using the dryer to set my hair and it turned out GREAT!!! I've read several reviews on people saying that it was noisy to them BUT let's be realistic what hair dryer is actually quiet. Not even hair dryers at the salon are quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still being as good as 1st day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item last year. Still being as good as 1st day.
customer_reviews.author: Lianet_H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it don't close properly to make the hood it doesn't adjust and it overheats and shuts off
customer_reviews.author: FETTYWAPSLEFTEYE

customer_reviews.title: Conair HH400 Bonnet 1875 watt hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in great condition and I am pleased to say it lives up to my expectations. The only thing is, it has the collapsible hood an I am having a difficult time making it NOT collapse! But all in all, I think it is just an adjustment period between me an the dryer an I have to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Janette M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: A salon at home!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for one of my elderly friends. She just loves it! Just roll your hair and sit under the helmet while working puzzles or reading! It was a tad difficult to set up at first. The instructions are pretty small in type. After figuring it all out it is exactly what she wanted. And to be honest, I am glad she has it now because this is much easier than me standing and curling her hair with a curling iron. I would recommend this product again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this hair dryer to dry my hair and it works and does what is it suppose to do-- dry my hair. I agree with some of the comments about the dryer not drying the back of a person's head. That is true. I also found the bonnet to be very small. It I had rollers in my hair my head would not fit under it.
customer_reviews.author: Tesa W

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my handheld hair dryer broke. I've used it for a few weeks now and so far so good! The dryer is easy to set up, and heats very well. I don't sit under it with rollers or anything, just with my hair down after washing it. As such I do have to move my head around a bit to distribute the heat/air evenly, but it is much less work than my old hand dryer and dries much faster. I can dry my long, curly, thick hair in about 20 minutes. It's so easy to fold back up and store this dryer as well, which keeps it out of the way when I am not using it.
customer_reviews.author: G. C.

customer_reviews.title: Conair Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed once I received the item. Some of the reviews gave it high marks which I cannot understand. It is poorly constructed and the air vents only cover the top half of your head. I used it once and it was hurting my hearing so I couldn't finish using it. It truly sounds like a small propelled airplane is right next to you.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: YOUR GOING TO WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The most noisy bull crack product ever purchased.. omg PLEASE DO NOT PRCHASE... YOUR GOING TO WASTE YOUR MONEY!😤
customer_reviews.author: LaNegrita

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure when I bought this hair dryer because of the price, I had been looking for a good hair dryer and came upon this one, I bought it and I was pleasantly surprised, I have curly fine hair and it dries it in no less than 45 minutes. Then all I do it close it and store it under my bed, no muss no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: PepprmintPatty

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 uses.
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok when I first used it - a'though the heat distribution is not not good - extremely hot on top but not on sides. I used it about 6 times and today, on the 7th time, it died. Wish I could get my money back. Next time I buy something like this from Amazon I will buy a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby V. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for thin, short or shoulder-length hair...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on hair that is not too thick or too long. Heats up fast. Good appliance for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bee

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but it's loud.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I have long hair so I obviously don't expect it to be able to thoroughly dry the hair that touches the middle of my back. I usually pin my hair or put it in rollers when drying and it does a good job and comes out nicely. I haven't had any issues with it getting to stay up or anything. I've even set it on a stack of pillow cushions and used it while I watched TV in bed. But it is really loud and obnoxious. I won't even use on the high setting because it sounds worse than when it's on the low setting.
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: Conair Hair Dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Nice hair dryer that I only use when I deep conditioner my daughter and my hair. I really try to avoid heat but to deep conditioner I figure this is fine. At least until I break down and purchase a steamer. I say it serves the purpose I purchased it for and it wasn't that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Aginger

customer_reviews.title: so awesome
customer_reviews.text: this hair dryer is great. I had an old hooded type and it was lost in a fire. I ordered this one after reaading alot of reviews. Couldn't be happier. Not that noisy, heats quickly, the size of the hood is big. I would recemond this hair dryer to any one that wants a compact, good hair dryer..
customer_reviews.author: Diane Alphson

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool for a moment.
customer_reviews.text: Super loud and doesn’t dry hair that fast. I will be keeping it just because, but I will definitely purchase another dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Zuri Major

customer_reviews.title: not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: not happy at all. only two settings...HOT or Sortake warm. would not allow a return. shame on them. thought Conair was a reputable company. will not be a return customer
customer_reviews.author: psahlin561

customer_reviews.title: No more frizzy curls.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my curly, frizzy hair! I put my products in my hair, and a few clips, and sit under this dryer while reading or answering emails (or playing games on my phone!). When I'm done there's no frizz, love it.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for Wet-setting
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I can fit a head full of curlers under it and the hi heat is pretty decent. Now if only I could get my hair pinning technique down... This may be a downside for some, the holes from which the air comes are only on the top, not the sides.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: wish i spend a little extra on another!
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other reviews I ignored before buying this, I was a bit disappointed. The dryer works fine & the heat is descent. It's the design of the product & the placement of the heat holes i don't understand! Why would Conair think that i would only want to dry half my hair?
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Jeudy

customer_reviews.title: Good drying power
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time. It worked very well on my hair and I have locs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Good Ole' Days!
customer_reviews.text: Its great for getting the most outta looking good. I roll only part of my hair, then grab a good book and sit and read til' I feel the heat. I get two things done at one time. Works Excellent! I use it every 3 days or so!
customer_reviews.author: Klassie K9

customer_reviews.title: Conair HH400 Collapsable Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is one of the best dryer you can have. My Mom is 96 years old and her hairdresser has started coming to the house to fix her hair and this dryer has worked wonderfully. Even her hairdresser was impressed and when we told her how little it cost she was blown away.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I use with rollers and I use for deep conditioning my hair. It gets the job done. I only use low setting because it gets pretty warm! It seems to take about 1hr to dry hair in rollers, but I'm usually reading, doing homework, or my nails while I wait so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne&Christian

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Birthday Gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought the dryer for my birthday last week. I did a deep conditioning for 30 mins on low heat but next time I might keep it under for an hour. I fell in love with it. It is just like the regular dryers at the salon but more comfortable because you're at home. It's not as noisy like the other reviewers said. I did think it take a while for your hair to dry but if you don't have nothing to do within your day then you're fine. I moved around in different positions while it was drying and it wasn't too bad. Thank you sweetie for getting this for me!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Not a top of the line dryer but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived on time. Dryer is somewhat flimsy so be careful in retracting hood and setting up height. It seems as if it could easily break. Hood is not too deep so top of my head was overdried while ends were still damp. For the price it is a decent dryer-just be prepared for uneveness of drying on head of hair.
customer_reviews.author: E. McCalla

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Fast Drying
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews for this product and others like it before purchasing and I'm glad I purchased this model. The dryer is very compact, about the size of a shoebox that a pair of boots come in, and it gets hot fast and dries your hair easily. Opening and closing the dryer takes a minute to learn then you are good to go. Some reviewers report having to turn from side to side to dry your head but I did not have to do that. However that alone would not have prevented me from buying this product. Good product. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleReviewsItAll

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting so much more. This dryer is SO LOUD it is almost unbearable to sit under🤬. Horrible experience. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Hermecia Clark

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dryer that would be adequately hot. 1875 watts was the highest dryer I could find and at first I wasn't really sure about Conair. But I have to say, I was impressed with it's compact, space-saving base and the way it was designed to be a self-contained storage storage unit small enough to fit under my cabinet. Easy to set up and easy to take down, heated nice and evenly. I would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: 1derfulU

customer_reviews.title: Construction of dryer isn't nearly as good as the ones made 30 years ago
customer_reviews.text: It dries the hair with rollers very well. Construction of dryer isn't nearly as good as the ones made 30 years ago, but this is true with all products. I like that it folds up to a smaller size so it is easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: K9 Lover

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I rather enjoyed my dryer. It is big, easy to put together and not much noisier than any salon types. The fold-away feature is a life saver for those with young children and for space proposes
customer_reviews.author: P. Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Read the negative reviews FIRST
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this-Amazon return process is EZ! Anyway, as a few others stated, the bonnet doesnt line up for a secure snap on fit. Get another model, spend a little more money
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Returned this product
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work in that a person can't get their head inside the unit where the heat comes out...very cumbersome. We bought a standing version instead and it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: suki

customer_reviews.title: Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: The hair dryer was a great price. However, the fumes that came from it when I attempted to use it almost knocked me out. I never could use this product. I will not purchase another one
customer_reviews.author: Goldenlady2

customer_reviews.title: I have not seen any like this one
customer_reviews.text: What a different hairdryer, I have not seen any like this one. It gets the job done like the original hair dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The product does not work well. The hood does not close completely and the noise level is so high. Unfortunately cant return because it's past the 30 days return policy 😒😒
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Durable I've had it for over 8 years and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Kera

customer_reviews.title: It worked pretty well
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and functioned as expected. The difficulty is that it's difficult for an elderly person to fold up and store. My Mom is 90 and her old bonnet dryer didn't work so I purchased this one. I could assemble it and disassemble it pretty easy, but it was too much for her. So what I decided to do was find a location and leave it set up so all she needed to do was put her head under it and turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goltermann

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: I dont really have a place I can put this. It is a pain to set up and use, it is not even worth it. So I dont even know if this works properly because I have nowhere to put it and use it
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good but
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good but, because of all the weight on the front, makes the neck very weak. Now I have to hold it up while I dry my hair. Next time I will get a bonnet head dryer.
customer_reviews.author: bpwarren

customer_reviews.title: Kidda loud on high setting
customer_reviews.text: It's kidda loud on high.. First time using it. I will see how long it takes to dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE REED

customer_reviews.title: MY HEAD IS IN HEAVEN NOW.
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is really hot and it works really good. I have to use a deep conditioner on my hair because my lupus is pulling it out. My sister has used it already. It gives out great heat and so light weight. I since my lupus is in my joints so it is not heavy on my hand. I would recommended this ConairHH400 hair dryer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer!  Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great heat!!! Bought it for my hairstylist to use at home and it is just perfect. It helps my hair color work faster than at the salon!
customer_reviews.author: NANCI LENOCI

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. .. So very glad Amazon had this product. Heats up fast, easy to set up and take down. Love being able to sit under hooded dryer to deep condition.
customer_reviews.author: Prettygirl53

customer_reviews.title: This hair dryer did not dry my hair properly. ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer did not dry my hair properly. It was much too shallow. It did not worf for me so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works Real Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to dry mom's hair when the weather is too bad to take her to the salon. It works very well, is easily stored and doesn't bother her to use as the salon dryer does. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: V. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very effective, even at the low setting. Sturdy on any surface. Love it. A little loud on high but I don't need it that hot anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Folake Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sorry but I can't find anything positive to say about ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but I can't find anything positive to say about this it was extremely cheaply made loud and just ineffective
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Bosland

customer_reviews.title: conair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This conair HH400 collapsable bonnet 1875-watt hair dryer is great i gave it a 100% rating because it's very comfortable and i will be purchasing another for my neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: terrie asheber

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I set up the hair dryer because all the airholes are in the top. I wondered if it would adequately dry the back and sides of my head. To my surprise, it did. It also folds compactly and takes up less space than my old dryer. So far, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: It works well for me because I am short. ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well for me because I am short. If you are taller you might have to stack it on book when you put it on the table.
customer_reviews.author: strawberry sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but location and comfort when using this dryer is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Learned to check debth of hood.
customer_reviews.text: Dries my hair fast - but hood needs to be deeper. Ok on my short hair but does not dry lower back of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Too Noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Product works but the amount of noise emanating from the motor gave indication that something might be wrong with it. Could be a factory fault.
customer_reviews.author: kevofran

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily - wish the hood was just ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily - wish the hood was just a little bit bigger to get the hair on the back of the next
customer_reviews.author: Janice J. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural African-American woman and I have been looking for a dryer for the sole purpose of deep conditioning my hair. This is a perfect affordable dryer for this. It's easy to adjust according to your height, it drys all parts of your hair, and it easy to store away. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: too shallow to adequately cover the head and tooooo darned noisy. Cheaply made and it shows when you try to use it
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not as described bonnet is very small impossible to roller ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as described bonnet is very small impossible to roller set hair using this very small bonnet also product had been repackaged dirt & hair noted in the bonney
customer_reviews.author: onenamill38

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer. It is very compact and delivers just the right amount of heat.This hairdryer is comparable to the dryers used in beauty salons. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elliesmom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not balance on surfaces. I have to use my 3lb weight to weight it down.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: SHould Have Taken The Advice of Others
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible design. Like other reviewers have said, the dryer only dries the top of your hair, which makes the drying process exceedingly long and tedious. I wish I could send this back, I absolutely hate it and cannot believe that it is 1875 watts, since the drying process is so slow and inefficient. A waste of money, save your money and buy another hood hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bird

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that said that this dryer didn't dry the sides and back of your head, but this was not a problem for me. I just tilted my head a little to get the air on my sides. I live in a small NYC apartment and love that it folds down for storage. I had a hooded dryer before that was not collapsible and found that this one works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: PJH

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: These are becoming extinct. Very hard to find especially for the older gals. Since I cannot stand for hours blow drying I needed a bonnet hairdryer and found one at Amazon. Very pleased with it light weight but only has 2 speeds high and low. My only problem with this is; it does NOT have drying vents on the drying stand to dry the hair curlers around your neck. You have to keep turning your head and stretching up to reach the bottom curlers.
customer_reviews.author: connie suell

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: it is good for when you need to use those hard rollers for the different look that you need, it feels like the ones at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the hair dyer, it works well on the low setting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, a bit awkward, but considering the task it has to perform a good buy for the price. If you need one, it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Too much for Grandma
customer_reviews.text: It may work fine but was too difficult for an 88 year old grandma to set up and take down. It is more difficult than her old Gold-N-Hot she had had for years..
customer_reviews.author: moviegeek

customer_reviews.title: lots of air vents to quickly dry your hair great if you use very large rollers like I do
customer_reviews.text: Big hood , lots of air vents to quickly dry your hair great if you use very large rollers like I do.
customer_reviews.author: ANN

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dryer. It's very compact, has ideal temperature settings, easy to store and great to use! Thanks for the prompt receipt and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Loves Books

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Im loving my new dryer although its not as big as it looks on the top part. I think it will get the job done for now and again for the price you cant beat it...its also kinda loud.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lady!

customer_reviews.title: Conair Hooded Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This item was ordered to replace another brand that I had used for well over 30 years. While this unit will serve my purpose, I agree with some of the other reviewers that it could stand some improvement. The shape and depth of the "bonnet" is not very comfortable to sit under and it is a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.author: hugo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't workout
customer_reviews.text: Although it was probably effective, I'd gotten it for my octogenarian mother. It was too much to handle and too complicated to fold up and put away. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

product_meta.title: Conair Pro Style Collapsible Bonnet Hair Dryer, White, Universal
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Collapsible Bonnet Hair Dryer| Color:WhiteWrap your head around all the power in this compact bonnet hair dryer with an extra-roomy hood and adjustable height. Streamline the drying process with 1875 watts of power and even airflow distribution. Folds neatly for easy, compact storage.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Extra-roomy hood accommodates a set of jumbo rollers
Variable airflow settings for maximum styling comfort
Even airflow distribution gently surrounds the head to dry hair evenly
2 heat/speed settings with 6-foot long cord (stores in base)
